website_summaries.verdict: This is the CD player to take with you while you travel. It's reliable and has good sound.
pros: Plays CD, CD-R, CD-RW, MP3, and WMA formats
Sound effects features changes the settings according to the type of music
cons: Some units arrive defective and don't work or break within a short time

customer_reviews.title: Good MP3 Player
customer_reviews.text: There is no remote control for this p;layer. I am using to play through Bose radio/CD player device. Plays through the "AUX" feature of the Bose. Works good.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Alan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as a car CD replacement
customer_reviews.text: This will not work as a car CD replacement. We tried it with a new 2019 Honda CRV using a USB audio input. Device is not compatible.
customer_reviews.author: David Anderson

customer_reviews.title: One reason it might not work or why your batteries might be dead.
customer_reviews.text: The stop button is also the on/off button. But unless you read further you might not realize that to turn the player off, you have to push the stop button twice. I used the player in my house but a couple of days later, when I tried to use the device in my car it wouldn't work. Then I read about the need to push the stop button twice and I realized that my batteries might be dead. Even though it was connected to an external power source, it wouldn't work until I removed the dead batteries. I tested them, they were dead. It now works great.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I hate it and am sorry I purchased it. Buttons are hard to push and very noisy. The lid doesn’t open wide enough to change the CD. The only reason I didn’t request a return is because I need to use it every night for therapy and can’t be without a CD player. I don’t recommend it especially for the amount of money it cost. The only good thing is that it has good sound quality for verbal CDs, I don’t know about music because I don’t use it for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: A'OK five star all the way. I purchased this for my blind father & showed him how to operate it & presto he says this is the easiest cd player he ever operated in his blind life also my father says its got the best quality sound for audio books thats real reason we got it for him was for the sound & resume. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great CD player
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Used it and a vacation with CD book. It saved the place each time I stopped the player so I could pickup where I left off.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and Underperformed.
customer_reviews.text: Player frequently skips (the same CDs do not have this problem with several other players, only this one). Hard to use as it is not at all intuitive. I still wonder why I have to turn player "off" to make it work, and "on" to shut it down??? While it is sleek in appearance you cannot read the controls. I have to keep a small flashlight near the player to read controls. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysCurious

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient and reliable product
customer_reviews.text: I use my player to listen to lectures only , not for music listening. What I can say about that is that this CD player is very , very good; never had anything close to this by comparison . The rewind feature is really nice when listening to lectures . It’s a very solid product ; can tell it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Compagnone

customer_reviews.title: One can restart the cd music/book where one leaves off.
customer_reviews.text: CD books, and cd music. I wished a feature where I can stop the book; and start up again where I left off; same with a cd. MANY of these players do NOT have that feature, unless paying way more $$$. Easy to read instructions, and to understand them.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Write Legible Instructions!
customer_reviews.text: Nice machine and the sound is good, but it’s very difficult to get started. The instructions are in miniature and frankly not clear. Also it’s not clear what kind of external charger you need other than a USB port to keep it running. I feel the manufacturer let users down and let it self down with inadequate instructions for users.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Complicated
customer_reviews.text: Hott has taken a product and made it to complicated to work easily !! To many options with a completely inadequate instruction manual !!! all I want to do is ride my bicycle and lessen to music !!! not change the world !!!!! I would not buy this contraption and waist my time and money again !!!! - JHW
customer_reviews.author: John Harold Williams Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, one arrived not working. Customer service said to send in for replacement, spent $12 sending in, never heard from them again. The other player works good but is very fragile. The customer service in non- existant
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good player out of box.
customer_reviews.text: This player has been working well this first day. Good sound with my own quality earphones. All functions operating. Anti shock takes bumps and light shaking OK.
customer_reviews.author: The Rev. R. Kingsbury Chase

customer_reviews.title: Anti-skip/sockproof  protection stinks
customer_reviews.text: Had a Sony Walkman CD player for years. It died and I bought this as a replacement. Chiefly used to listen to audio books while walking. The Sony handled that well. This one is lousy and I cannot walk and listen unless I hold it horizontal in my hand as I walk. Also clumsy to open to insert a disk. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Lariviere

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this CD player. It seems a little smaller than ones I have had before and I really like that. It is a great looking CD player and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: L.L.L.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECGT!
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY WHAT I WANTED! Thank you so much! You've just made my life so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Eva Marie Everson

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the CD player. Would get to a point in the cd and the player would stop. CD would play in our Bose player, so it wasn’t the CD.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM L. RIEDER

customer_reviews.title: worked for a short time.
customer_reviews.text: Sound was great for as long as it works.I only had it for maybe 3 weeks and it stopped working. It stopped at the time I tried it with the adapter.
customer_reviews.author: frequent buyer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best cd player i ever owned!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is phenomenal!!! It is terrific, great and I can't turn it off!! Great sound recommend to every one! Great buy for the money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: OK product similar to others
customer_reviews.text: Had to figure out how to work it--instructions not clear--from China.
customer_reviews.author: Ella M. Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road
customer_reviews.text: This Hott CD player is not as hardy as the one that I had to replace that lasted decades. The earbuds that accompanied the purchase did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Telling It Like It Is

customer_reviews.title: Does not shut off after last track
customer_reviews.text: No on off switch. Went through a couple of sets of batteries. You have to push stop fully for it to completely stop even after last track.
customer_reviews.author: Silvio Renzulli

customer_reviews.title: Small, compact, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for audio books that I get from the library. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G.

customer_reviews.title: Operation difficult
customer_reviews.text: Does not always respond the same to simple start button - confusion where by it should be simple
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Ann Gorski

customer_reviews.title: MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: Pros- easy for my mother to use who is almost blind. Has good sound. Cons-cannot charge with rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Good product Poor support
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Would benefit from a line-out. Very difficult to get customer support/register product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Good sounds, buttons can be somewhat confusing, wish it had a regular power cord or and audio cord. Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: seems like it will work just fine for me
customer_reviews.text: I am glad to see CD players being available again---especially since I have lots of books-on-CD and MP3
customer_reviews.author: caflick

customer_reviews.title: Great CD player
customer_reviews.text: Liked the small size. Used it for my CDs. I played it through my Bose radio.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia J. Lazer

customer_reviews.title: lemon
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this product. After using it for 4 weeks it started skipping every a few seconds. I have checked the CD on anther CD player and confirm that disk is OK. Also I missed one day of return policy and Amazon is not going to accept the return or replacement. So keep away from this CD player.
customer_reviews.author: Bo

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: After 2 hours it no longer works. The disc will turn, but no sound. The display show 3 dashes then displays disc. The owners manual does not say anything about the dashes or disc display
customer_reviews.author: mrgff522

customer_reviews.title: Easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item does not skip like other portable CD players. I like to listen to Audio Books I can check out from the library and this works great!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica F.

customer_reviews.title: So far no problems.  It is more pricey than other comparable devices.
customer_reviews.text: The price is high. So far, it has been worth it although I have not had the product for too long.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gettman

customer_reviews.title: Excelent portable CD player!
customer_reviews.text: CD players are hard to find. But this one is excellent. Just as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Franz

customer_reviews.title: A Solid overall device
customer_reviews.text: Only issue is that the player doesn't read all home-burned CD's
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bruno

customer_reviews.title: nice product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I liked ease of playing cd's The sound is quite clear and easily adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Eva Liggett

customer_reviews.title: Skipped on every CD
customer_reviews.text: CD Player was defective. Old CDs, new CDs, in a car, or sitting on a table. It skipped every time. Had to return it. I'll get a different player next time.
customer_reviews.author: William R Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Product is more delicate than advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The unit does not seem to work well in a vertical position. I purchased a tune belt to wear while walking and gardening, and the unit seems to skip often.
customer_reviews.author: MTB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't work. It plays for a minute then stops. Restart and it stops again. I am trying to return it. Pam Gough
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Does ot work.  I threw box with address away.  Does not work.  Help.
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. I had an expert check it out Something was wrong. Contact me a catdixon4@yahoo.com How can I retuirn it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon whipple

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: Player is just barely loud enough. Very frustrating because I really need it!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Schiller

customer_reviews.title: HOTT  Model CD511
customer_reviews.text: Found this difficult to operate or to follow instructions. Did play one song, but only one song.
customer_reviews.author: James D. Collett, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It only lasted a month
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for like a month then it just quit working
customer_reviews.author: Laurel gregg

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Brand new and wouldn’t work. Too bad I threw out the box and all the other stuff before I found out.
customer_reviews.author: LUM

customer_reviews.title: Smooth complaint
customer_reviews.text: The buttons are so smooth, we cannot differentiate them in the dark..
customer_reviews.author: John M Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the process to change from CD to CD.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Lynch

customer_reviews.title: will need to return item.
customer_reviews.text: disk player started skipping and is very hard to listen to.
customer_reviews.author: Clydene Gage

product_meta.title: Portable CD Player, Personal Compact Disc CD Player with Headphones, Anti-Skip/Shockproof Protection Small Music Walkman MP3 Players with LCD Display for Adults Students Kids, Gift for Car Use
feature_bullets: 🎁【CLASSIC And Small】Classic Design, Small Size (5.6 Inch), Light Weight (7.2 Oz). Best Gift Choice for Music Enthusiasts, Language Learners, Elders, Kids, Good Friends.【No Bluetooth, Not Rechargeable, Use 2 x AA Batteries or USB Power Cable to Play】

🎁【IMPORTANT NOTES】1. The Personal CD Player has no loudspeaker, MUST be used with headphones or external loudspeaker. 2. The HOLD Button (at the back of the CD Player) should be switch to OFF position before playing a CD. 3. The CD Player uses 2 x AA Batteries (not included in the packaging) or USB power cable (included) to run. The USB cable Does NOT charge the CD Player.

🎁【Perfect Compatibility】Support Discs: CD Original Disc, MP3 Disc, CD-R, CD-RW. Support Music Files: CD-DA, MP3, WMA. Could not Play VCD/DVD. Support AUX Connection with all other audio devices via 3.5mm Jack.

🎁【Multi-Functions】Volume Control, 3.5mm AUX Output, LCD Display, Skip Forward/Back, Play/Pause, Keylock, Electronic Skip Protection, Anti-Shock, 5 Sound EQ EQ Effects(BBS, POP, JAZZ, ROCK, CLASSIC), 4 Playback Modes.

🎁【Warranty and Packaging】1 Year Warranty. Packaing Includes: Disc CD Player x1 Headphones x1 USB Power Cable x1 User Manual x1 Maexus is committed to providing each customer with the highest standard of customer service. If there is any doubt, please contact seller without concern.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars99 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
